other_tests.findings: 3+ proteinuria, an increase from 1+ one year earlier.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased proteinuria noted; 1+ one year earlier.

other_tests.findings: Reduced exercise capacity with no evidence of ischemia.
Incomplete closure of the mitral valve, moderate mitral regurgitation, left atrium dilated, estimated left ventricular ejection fraction of 44 percent.
Moderate amount of lambda Bence Jones protein, large amount of albumin.
Moderate biventricular failure and mitral regurgitation.
Congo red stain for amyloid was negative.
Deposits of amorphous extracellular material with classic apple-green birefringence indicating amyloid.
